rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Welcoming area with Vastu oriented entrance. Features a small reception desk, seating area and storage.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious Mediterranean styled living room with high ceilings, natural light, and an open kitchen layout.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, featuring a breakfast bar and seating.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen & Dining
rooms.description: Modern Mediterranean styled open kitchen integrated with dining area, featuring ample cabinetry and a breakfast nook.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A large master bedroom with attached ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet and Vastu-compliant positioning (eastern wall for morning light).

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Ensuite bathroom with premium fixtures and Vastu-friendly design.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious guest bedroom located on the ground floor for ease of access, with Vastu consideration.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom designed to be accessible from the guest bedroom.

rooms.name: Dedicated Home Office
rooms.description: Quiet and well-ventilated home office positioned with a north-facing view, incorporating Vastu principles for concentration.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Separate living and sleeping area for staff, with kitchenette and small bathroom. Positioned to maintain privacy.

rooms.name: Garage Entrance
rooms.description: Area leading to the two-car garage, designed with sufficient clearance and Vastu aligned entrance.

openings.name: Front Entrance Door
openings.description: Vastu-optimized entrance door ensuring positive energy flow.

openings.name: Back Entrance Door
openings.description: Provides additional access, aligning with Vastu principles of balanced spatial energy.
